flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in width between where they're starting from and their destination is 80-50 = <<80-50=30>>30 yards
The width increases 2 yards every 10 m along the river so they would have to cover (30/2)*10 = <<(30/2)*10=510>>510 meters
Traveling at the rate of 5m/s, he will spend 510/5 = <<510/5=102>>102 seconds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150.0, not 510.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
